roni.com.coupons

Class CustomerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • roni.com.coupons.CustomerService

  • @Path(value="customer")
public class CustomerService
extends java.lang.Object
    this Customer Service class contains all the methods an authorized Customer is able to reach in Coupon System
    Author:
    roni

      void purchaseCoupon(java_beans.Coupon coupon)

    • Method Detail

      • purchaseCoupon

        @PUT
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="purchasecoupon")
public void purchaseCoupon(java_beans.Coupon coupon)
        This service method will perform purchase that will indicate that the coupon now belongs to the logged in Customer
        Parameters:
        coupon - is the Object Coupon to purchase

      • getAllPurchasedCoupons

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="coupons")
public java.util.Collection<java_beans.Coupon> getAllPurchasedCoupons()
        Returns:
        a Collection of all Coupons owned by the logged in Customer

      • getCouponsForPurchase

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="couponsforpurchase")
public java.util.Collection<java_beans.Coupon> getCouponsForPurchase()
        Returns:
        a Collection of all Coupons available for purchase for the logged in Customer

      • getAllPurchasedCouponsByType

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="coupontype/{type}")
public java.util.Collection<java_beans.Coupon> getAllPurchasedCouponsByType(@PathParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                                           java_beans.CouponType type)
        Parameters:
        type - is the Coupon type (category)
        Returns:
        a Collection of all Coupons owned by the logged in Customer associated with the given type

      • getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="couponprice/{price}")
public java.util.Collection<java_beans.Coupon> getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice(@PathParam(value="price")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Double price)
        Parameters:
        price - is the maximum price of coupons retrieved
        Returns:
        a Collection of all Coupons owned by the logged in Customer with a lower cost then the given price

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="customerdetails")
public java_beans.Customer getCustomerDetails()
        Returns:
        the Object Customer of the logged in Customer
